sec.div: Ethics approval and consent to participant
sec.p: Ethical approval was obtained from Medical Research and Ethical Committee (MREC), Ministry of Health Malaysia (ref: [ 5] KKM/NIHSEC/P17â€“350). In addition, permissions to carry out the research at selected clinics were obtained from each respective state health directors as well as the medical officer-in-charge of each clinic. Written Consent from participants was obtained prior the interview.
